meanings.definition: A person whose wealth amounts to at least a billion dollars.
meanings.sent1: The billionaire donated a large sum to charity.
meanings.sent2: She became a billionaire after starting her own successful company.
meanings.sent3: The billionaire decided to buy a private island for their pet elephant.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, he was known as the billionaire wizard.
meanings.sent5: The billionaire's mansion was so grand, it had its own zip code.

meanings.definition: One who has a net worth of one billion dollars or more.
meanings.sent1: The young entrepreneur dreamt of becoming a billionaire one day.
meanings.sent2: The billionaire invested in various industries to diversify their portfolio.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone mistook him for a billionaire playboy.
meanings.sent4: Her success in tech made her a billionaire queen of Silicon Valley.
meanings.sent5: The billionaire's yacht was so luxurious, it had a swimming pool on board.
